rooms.description: Spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south wall to maximize natural light and enhance the Mediterranean aesthetic.
Open dining area adjacent to the kitchen, featuring Mediterranean design elements such as terracotta tiles and ornamental detailing.
Fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances and ample storage, incorporating natural light through skylights or adjoining windows.

Penthouse master bedroom designed with a Mediterranean flair featuring elegant finishes and floor-to-ceiling windows on one wall for an airy feel. Vastu principles ensure that the bed placement promotes positive energy flow.
Modern bathroom with Mediterranean accents and ample ventilation. Designed following local building codes for safety.
